name: Colours - The colour management app.
description: A colour management platform, built by developers, for developers. create colour palettes, add unique descriptions to colours within those palettes, and manage a full colour library. Perfect for managing colours across multiple development projects. Tech: Angular 4.0, Node, Express, Sass, HTML 5 / CSS 3

name: MEAN Stack User Management Boilerplate
description: A user management boilerplate for future projects, comprising of a user regiatration / login form and user management dashboard. Tech: Node / Angular, MongoDB, Bcrypt encription, HTML 5, CSS 3, Sass

name: MEAN Stack Project Management Application
description: My take on expanding popular to-do list applications, you can register for an account, login and manage multiple projects from a single smooth application. Tech: Node, Express, MongoDB, Angular 4.0 + HTML 5 / CSS 3

name: Shipamax Build
description: A full rebuild of the Shipamax site (https://shipamax.com/) using Angular 4.0, HTML 5, CSS 3, OO JS + more. Fully responsive

name: ngWarcraft Angular Application
description: A Warcraft themed web application, built using Angular 4 + custom pipes, HTML 5 / CSS 3 (custom carousel), OO JS. Users can check things such as realm status, current PVP leaderboards as well as the latest news.

name: Illdy Theme
description: A clean, responsive front-end, built from the ground up with HTML 5, CSS 3, Sass jQuery (Slick carousel / smooth scrolling).

name: Zerif theme
description: A front-end build based on the popular Zerif theme design. built using HTML 5, CSS 3, OO JavaScript (menu toggles), Jquery (Slick / Smooth scrolling), Sass. Fully responsive.

name: Agencia Theme
description: A mock-up for a digital agency site comprising services, portfolio, about, team & contact

name: Start Bootstrap Theme
description: A build based on a Bootstrap theme, built from the ground up with HTML 5, CSS 3, Sass & vanilla JS.

name: Deliveroo Build
description: A rebuild of the deliveroo site, made to be responsive

name: LoyaltyLion Build
description: SaaS Site rebuild based on LoyaltyLion (start-up)

name: FieldMargin Build
description: Fully responsive mock-up, based on the original Fieldmargin site.

name: Forty Theme
description: Responsive single page theme, re-built from scratch by me.
